title: Aquanis
description: The Desmond triplets are back as they journey to the land of the ancestors, Aquanis, to deal with their new found status as prince and princesses. The only problem is they don't all get there safely, as Ty Rabe has executed his initial plan to divide and conquer. Meckenzie will need the help of the Morrigan, a beautiful set of sisters who are the leaders of the Temple Morrigan if she has any hope of saving the day.
author: M.C. Moore
